title: BONUS EPISODE: Kes On State of Soca Music, Trinidad, On Da Reggae Tip + 'Liki Tiki'
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Soca artist Kes stopped by Ebro in the Morning just before hopping on the On Da Reggae & Soca Tip stage September 2 to discuss a variety of topics including making Soca music more mainstream, life during the middle of the pandemic, Trinidad's history, and the inspiration behind his latest single 'Liki Tiki'! On Da Reggae & Soca Tip goes down 9/2 from the Coney Island Amphitheater! Tickets on sale now at Ticketmaster. #Kes #HOT97 #EbrointheMorning
